notaryDataPage.welcomeToApp: Welcome to the app Emernotar: NPU!
notaryDataPage.notaryDataSettingsInfo: When you first start you need to save the standard data for future use.

notarizationResultPage.successDescriptionFirst: Details of the transaction by the number in the registry can be found in
notarizationResultPage.successDescriptionSecond: If you later change something in this document, you must repeat the signing procedure. To do this, click "Edit"
notarizationResultPage.qrCodeLabel: Click on the QR code and it will appear in the document where the cursor is.
